name: The Last Garden (Soleam)
description:
The Last Garden

WASD : Move

Mouse : Aiming/Firing

You are a robot protecting the last flower in the world after the entire planet has gone through desertification.

Fight mutants and bring water to the Oasis to help it grow!

__________________________________________

This is my first game done using Godot! It's really amazing for 2d, and it's really easy to prototype stuff using GDScript so I would highly recommend it for gamejams.

Graphics, music and code are all done by me.
